mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menus (store_id, ui_id, menu_name, discount_rate, price, category_id) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{uiId}, #{menuName}, #{discountRate}, #{price}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT menu_id, category_id, menu_name, ui_id, discount_rate, price, created_at FROM menus WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT menu_id, category_id, menu_name, ui_id, discount_rate, price, created_at FROM menus WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}

SELECT M.menu_id, M.menu_name, M.discount_rate, M.price, U.ui_id, U.color_code, U.position_x, U.position_y, U.size_type FROM menus M INNER JOIN ui_layout U ON M.ui_id = U.ui_id WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
